xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 31 January 2014
xwikidoc.content: <akats1> has joined #phenotips 10:22 <akats1> So here's the refactoring comparison. I feel like I forgot something though. https://github.com/soLEED/phenotips-1/compare/issue-refactor?expand=1 10:31 <sdumitriu1> akats1: Looking 10:53 <sdumitriu1> akats1: Looks good, make a PR 13:13 <akats1> You can't use a component that was injected with @Inject in the constructor? 13:13 <sdumitriu1> No 13:13 <sdumitriu1> You should use "implements Initializable" 13:28 <sdumitriu1> akats1: Can you also make the same changes that you did in https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/pull/690 but for https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/master/components/solr-access-service/src/main/java/org/phenotips/solr/AbstractSolrScriptService.java#L92 ? 14:10 <akats1> If it doesn't give me a classFanOut, can I just stick it into the abstractSolr? 14:12 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:12 <sdumitriu1> If it does, let me know before changing other things 14:13 <sdumitriu1> Since this is a deprecated module, it would be simpler to just disable that specific check 14:14 <akats1> ok 15:06 <akats1> So how would I test the changes if both components are named hpo? 15:32 <sdumitriu1> akats1: This sounds useful: http://guides.github.com 15:34 <akats1> I know what broke by the way. 15:34 <sdumitriu1> Good 15:34 <akats1> Changing he port to 9090 doesn't change the configuration string 15:34 <sdumitriu1> Ah, right' 15:34 <sdumitriu1> :D 15:35 <phenotips_guest_> has joined #phenotips 15:36 <phenotips_guest_> has quit 15:55 <marta__> has quit 16:12 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 16:41 <marta__> has quit 16:58 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 18:02 <akats1> Could you take a look at what I have so far when you have the time, see if I'm going in the right direction 18:23 <akats1> has quit 18:44 <marta__> has quit
